messages.title: LISTENING TO YOU
messages.content: Everyone I meet has something to tell me about how we can make our country and our community better.

messages.title: SPEAKING UP FOR EPPING FOREST
messages.content: You have told me how angry you are about your high taxes. Conservative governments have stuck to the basic principles when Labour makes a mess of the economy. National Insurance will be reversed. We will back small businesses which are the foundation of our society.

messages.title: WORKING TOGETHER...
messages.content: Labour have tried to control everything from the centre. It doesn't work. Conservatives want you to people like. We want to feel it know what is best for your own family and your own community.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: You want a better and more disciplined education system.
You hate Government red tape and interference.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Access to Health and Social Services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: You want better access to health and social services and to let professionals get on with the job.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support for People Doing the Right Thing
keyPolicies.policyDescription: You want to help people who do the right thing and deal with people who do the wrong thing.
Protecting local green belt areas and rejecting plans for new gypsy and traveller sites.
Helping local people make local decisions and solve local problems.
Reversing the increase in National Insurance.
Ensuring troops and their families receive the support they deserve.

issues.economy: Labour have tried to control everything from the centre. It doesn't work.
issues.education: You want a better and more disciplined education system.
issues.environment: Protecting local green belt areas and rejecting plans for new gypsy and traveller sites.
issues.governance: You hate Government red tape and interference.
issues.health: You want better access to health and social services and to let professionals get on with the job.
issues.immigration: We will raise the basic state pension and make benefits fair, we will reduce immigration.

housing.content: Protecting local green belt areas and rejecting plans for new gypsy and traveller sites.

images.caption: A STRONG VOICE FOR EPPING FOREST
WORKING TOGETHER... FOR A BETTER FUTURE FOR BRITAIN

leaflet.additionalNotes: IT'S YOUR VOTE THAT COUNTS! - PLEASE VOTE ELEANOR LAING - CONSERVATIVE
